Preferred Mail Service Pharmacy

Get savings and convenience delivered right to your mailbox when you use home delivery through OptumRX, your plan's preffered mail service pharmacy. You could pay less for the same medications.

Contact Optum Rx

OptumRx Preferred Mail Service Pharmacy PO Box 2975
Shawnee Mission, KS
66201-1375
Call toll-free: 1-877-266-4832, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. TTY users, call 711.

Learn More

Pharmacy Saver offers prescriptions as low as $XX.XX

Pharmacy SaverTM is a cost savings prescription drug program available to you as a plan member. UnitedHealthcare® has worked with many of our network pharmacies to offer even lower prices on many common prescription drugs. You may be able to pay less than your plan co-pay for your prescription drugs with the Pharmacy Saver program.

Learn More
More Information keyboard_arrow_down

This directory is current as of the first Sunday of each month.

All network pharmacies may not be listed in this directory. Inclusion of a pharmacy does not guarantee that the pharmacy is open, is at the same location as listed in this online directory, or is included in the network. The pharmacy network may change at any time. You will receive notice when necessary. Please contact UnitedHealthcare® for details.

If you would like a Pharmacy Directory mailed to you, please contact UnitedHealthcare. You can also print a directory from your online search results.

AARP® Medicare Plans insured through UnitedHealthcare have contracts with pharmacies that equal or exceed CMS requirements for pharmacy access in your area.
